availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Located in Frankfort, Kentucky. Branches at Covington, Princeton, Maysville, Henderson, Mount Sterling, Somerset,. Existed from September 16, 1850 to present. Founding President, John H. Hanna. President in 1860, P Swigert.

bibl.p: Adelaide R. Hasse, Index of Economic Material Documents of the States of the United States: Kentucky 1792 – 1904 (Washington DC: Carnegie Institution of Washington, 1910), 91; Circular Statement, Relating to the Farmers’ Bank of Kentucky (New York: WM. Van Norden, 1850).
